Articles.Content:
Hello dear Community!

I actually joined this forum only to show off a artwork my girlfriend did

But after reading a few threads : this place seems to have a really nice community.

I started playing KSP about 2 Weeks ago. I knew it from "Robbaz", a Swedish guy who makes ridiculous videos on YouTube.

So, I couldn't hold back and played the demo. After I saw that i had a Demo playtime of around 8 hours, i knew i had to buy it. And I did not regret it!

In RL i study Medicine and live in Germany.

Now, if rocket science wouldn't be so damn complicated, I probably would have studied this

Greetings
Hello Rekilein. Most people don't play the demo for long before deciding to buy the game. You won't regret it. (Unless your grades start to slip.)
Nice to meet you, Rekilein. May many mostly-safe Jool gravity assists await you.
